metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18169 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: User process can perform the kernel DOS in ashmem when doing cache maintenance operation in all Android releases(Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android) from CAF using the Linux kernel.

notes.Note: sbeattie> ashmem cache maintenance ops (ashmem_cache_op()) are not present upstream or in Ubuntu kernels.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
